verses.verse: בֵּאדַ֛יִן <WH116> Then דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <WH1868> Darius מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> the king שָׂ֣ם <WH7761> made טְעֵ֑ם <WH2942> a decree וּבַקַּ֣רוּ ׀ <WH1240> and search בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1005> was made in the house סִפְרַיָּ֗א <WH5609> of the rolls דִּ֧י <WH1768> forasmuch גִנְזַיָּ֛א <WH1596> the treasures מְהַחֲתִ֥ין <WH5182> were laid up תַּמָּ֖ה <WH8536> where בְּבָבֶֽל׃ <WH895> in Babylon

וְהִשְׁתְּכַ֣ח <WH7912> And there was found בְּאַחְמְתָ֗א <WH307> at Achmetha בְּבִֽירְתָ֛א <WH1001> in the palace דִּ֛י <WH1768> which בְּמָדַ֥י <WH4076> of the Medes מְדִינְתָּ֖ה <WH4083> that [is] in the province מְגִלָּ֣ה <WH4040> roll חֲדָ֑ה <WH2298> a וְכֵן־ <WH3652> thus כְּתִ֥יב <WH3790> written בְּגַוַּ֖הּ <WH1459> and therein דִּכְרוֹנָֽה׃ <WH1799> [was] a record פ

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8140> year חֲדָ֜ה <WH2298> In the first לְכ֣וֹרֶשׁ <WH3567> of Cyrus מַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> the king כּ֣וֹרֶשׁ <WH3567> [the same] Cyrus מַלְכָּא֮ <WH4430> the king שָׂ֣ם <WH7761> made טְעֵם֒ <WH2942> a decree בֵּית־ <WH1005> [concerning] the house אֱלָהָ֤א <WH426> of God בִֽירוּשְׁלֶם֙ <WH3390> at Jerusalem בַּיְתָ֣א <WH1005> Let the house יִתְבְּנֵ֔א <WH1124> be builded אֲתַר֙ <WH870> the place דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch דָבְחִ֣ין <WH1684> where they offered דִּבְחִ֔ין <WH1685> sacrifices וְאֻשּׁ֖וֹהִי <WH787> and let the foundations מְסֽוֹבְלִ֑ין <WH5446> thereof be strongly laid רוּמֵהּ֙ <WH7314> the height אַמִּ֣ין <WH521> cubits שִׁתִּ֔ין <WH8361> thereof threescore פְּתָיֵ֖הּ <WH6613> [and] the breadth אַמִּ֥ין <WH521> cubits שִׁתִּֽין׃ <WH8361> thereof threescore

נִדְבָּכִ֞ין <WH5073> rows דִּי־ <WH1768> forasmuch אֶ֤בֶן <WH69> stones גְּלָל֙ <WH1560> of great תְּלָתָ֔א <WH8532> [With] three וְנִדְבָּ֖ךְ <WH5073> and a row דִּי־ <WH1768> forasmuch אָ֣ע <WH636> timber חֲדַ֑ת <WH2323> of new וְנִ֨פְקְתָ֔א <WH5313> and let the expenses מִן־ <WH4481> out of בֵּ֥ית <WH1005> house מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> the king's תִּתְיְהִֽב׃ <WH3052> be given

וְ֠אַף <WH638> And also מָאנֵ֣י <WH3984> vessels בֵית־ <WH1005> of the house אֱלָהָא֮ <WH426> of God דִּ֣י <WH1768> which דַהֲבָ֣ה <WH1722> let the golden וְכַסְפָּא֒ <WH3702> and silver דִּ֣י <WH1768> which נְבֽוּכַדְנֶצַּ֗ר <WH5020> which Nebuchadnezzar הַנְפֵּ֛ק <WH5312> took forth מִן־ <WH4481> out of הֵיכְלָ֥א <WH1965> the temple דִי־ <WH1768> which בִירוּשְׁלֶ֖ם <WH3390> which [is] at Jerusalem וְהֵיבֵ֣ל <WH2987> and brought לְבָבֶ֑ל <WH895> unto Babylon יַהֲתִיב֗וּן <WH8421> be restored וִ֠יהָךְ <WH1946> and brought again לְהֵיכְלָ֤א <WH1965> unto the temple דִי־ <WH1768> which בִירֽוּשְׁלֶם֙ <WH3390> which [is] at Jerusalem לְאַתְרֵ֔הּ <WH870> [every one] to his place וְתַחֵ֖ת <WH5182> and place בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1005> [them] in the house אֱלָהָֽא׃ <WH426> of God ס

כְּעַ֡ן <WH3705> Now תַּ֠תְּנַי <WH8674> Tattenai פַּחַ֨ת <WH6347> [therefore] Tatnai governor עֲבַֽר־ <WH5675> beyond נַהֲרָ֜ה <WH5103> the river שְׁתַ֤ר בּוֹזְנַי֙ <WH8370> Shetharboznai וּכְנָוָ֣תְה֔וֹן <WH3675> and your companions אֲפַרְסְכָיֵ֔א <WH671> the Apharsachites דִּ֖י <WH1768> of בַּעֲבַ֣ר <WH5675> which [are] beyond נַהֲרָ֑ה <WH5103> the river רַחִיקִ֥ין <WH7352> far הֲו֖וֹ <WH1934> be ye מִן־ <WH4481> from תַּמָּֽה׃ <WH8536> thence

שְׁבֻ֕קוּ <WH7662> alone לַעֲבִידַ֖ת <WH5673> Let the work בֵּית־ <WH1005> house אֱלָהָ֣א <WH426> of God דֵ֑ךְ <WH1791> of this פַּחַ֤ת <WH6347> let the governor יְהוּדָיֵא֙ <WH3062> of the Jews וּלְשָׂבֵ֣י <WH7868> and the elders יְהוּדָיֵ֔א <WH3062> of the Jews בֵּית־ <WH1005> house אֱלָהָ֥א <WH426> of God דֵ֖ךְ <WH1791> this יִבְנ֥וֹן <WH1124> build עַל־ <WH5922> in אַתְרֵֽהּ׃ <WH870> his place

וּמִנִּי֮ <WH4481> Moreover I שִׂ֣ים <WH7761> make טְעֵם֒ <WH2942> a decree לְמָ֣א <WH3964> what דִֽי־ <WH1768> [even] of תַֽעַבְד֗וּן <WH5648> ye shall do עִם־ <WH5974> to שָׂבֵ֤י <WH7868> the elders יְהוּדָיֵא֙ <WH3062> Jews אִלֵּ֔ךְ <WH479> of these לְמִבְנֵ֖א <WH1124> for the building בֵּית־ <WH1005> house אֱלָהָ֣א <WH426> of God דֵ֑ךְ <WH1791> of this וּמִנִּכְסֵ֣י <WH5232> goods מַלְכָּ֗א <WH4430> that of the king's דִּ֚י <WH1768> out מִדַּת֙ <WH4061> the tribute עֲבַ֣ר <WH5675> beyond נַהֲרָ֔ה <WH5103> the river אָסְפַּ֗רְנָא <WH629> forthwith נִפְקְתָ֛א <WH5313> expenses תֶּהֱוֵ֧א <WH1934> be מִֽתְיַהֲבָ֛א <WH3052> given לְגֻבְרַיָּ֥א <WH1400> men אִלֵּ֖ךְ <WH479> unto these דִּי־ <WH1768> and that לָ֥א <WH3809> that they be not לְבַטָּלָֽא׃ <WH989> hindered

וּמָ֣ה <WH4101> And that which חַשְׁחָ֡ן <WH2818> they have need of וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1123> both young תוֹרִ֣ין <WH8450> bullocks וְדִכְרִ֣ין <WH1798> and rams וְאִמְּרִ֣ין ׀ <WH563> and lambs לַעֲלָוָ֣ן ׀ <WH5928> for the burnt offerings לֶאֱלָ֪הּ <WH426> of the God שְׁמַיָּ֟א <WH8065> of heaven חִנְטִ֞ין <WH2591> wheat מְלַ֣ח ׀ <WH4416> salt חֲמַ֣ר <WH2562> wine וּמְשַׁ֗ח <WH4887> and oil כְּמֵאמַ֨ר <WH3983> according to the appointment כָּהֲנַיָּ֤א <WH3549> of the priests דִי־ <WH1768> in בִירֽוּשְׁלֶם֙ <WH3390> which [are] at Jerusalem לֶהֱוֵ֨א <WH1934> let it be מִתְיְהֵ֥ב <WH3052> given לְהֹ֛ם י֥וֹם ׀ <WH3118> them day בְּי֖וֹם <WH3118> by day דִּי־ <WH1768> forasmuch לָ֥א <WH3809> without שָׁלֽוּ׃ <WH7960> fail

דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch לֶהֱוֹ֧ן <WH1934> they מְהַקְרְבִ֛ין <WH7127> may offer נִיחוֹחִ֖ין <WH5208> sacrifices of sweet savours לֶאֱלָ֣הּ <WH426> unto the God שְׁמַיָּ֑א <WH8065> of heaven וּמְצַלַּ֕יִן <WH6739> and pray לְחַיֵּ֥י <WH2417> for the life מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> of the king וּבְנֽוֹהִי׃ <WH1123> and of his sons

וּמִנִּי֮ <WH4481> Also שִׂ֣ים <WH7761> I have made טְעֵם֒ <WH2942> a decree דִּ֣י <WH1768> who כָל־ <WH3606> any אֱנָ֗שׁ <WH606> man דִּ֤י <WH1768> who יְהַשְׁנֵא֙ <WH8133> shall alter פִּתְגָמָ֣א <WH6600> word דְנָ֔ה <WH1836> this יִתְנְסַ֥ח <WH5256> be pulled down אָע֙ <WH636> let timber מִן־ <WH4481> from בַּיְתֵ֔הּ <WH1005> his house וּזְקִ֖יף <WH2211> and being set up יִתְמְחֵ֣א <WH4223> let him be hanged עֲלֹ֑הִי <WH5922> thereon וּבַיְתֵ֛הּ <WH1005> and let his house נְוָל֥וּ <WH5122> a dunghill יִתְעֲבֵ֖ד <WH5648> be made עַל־ <WH5922> for דְּנָֽה׃ <WH1836> this

וֵֽאלָהָ֞א <WH426> And the God דִּ֣י <WH1768> who שַׁכִּ֧ן <WH7932> to dwell שְׁמֵ֣הּ <WH8036> that hath caused his name תַּמָּ֗ה <WH8536> there יְמַגַּ֞ר <WH4049> destroy כָּל־ <WH3606> all מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4430> kings וְעַם֙ <WH5972> and people דִּ֣י ׀ <WH1768> who יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7972> that shall put יְדֵ֗הּ <WH3028> to their hand לְהַשְׁנָיָ֛ה <WH8133> to alter לְחַבָּלָ֛ה <WH2255> [and] to destroy בֵּית־ <WH1005> house אֱלָהָ֥א <WH426> of God דֵ֖ךְ <WH1791> this דִּ֣י <WH1768> who בִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> which [is] at Jerusalem אֲנָ֤ה <WH576> I דָרְיָ֙וֶשׁ֙ <WH1868> Darius שָׂ֣מֶת <WH7761> have made טְעֵ֔ם <WH2942> a decree אָסְפַּ֖רְנָא <WH629> with speed יִתְעֲבִֽד׃ <WH5648> let it be done פ

אֱ֠דַיִן <WH116> Then תַּתְּנַ֞י <WH8674> Tattenai פַּחַ֧ת <WH6347> Tatnai governor עֲבַֽר־ <WH5675> on this side נַהֲרָ֛ה <WH5103> the river שְׁתַ֥ר בּוֹזְנַ֖י <WH8370> Shetharboznai וּכְנָוָתְה֑וֹן <WH3675> and their companions לָקֳבֵ֗ל <WH6903> according דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch שְׁלַ֞ח <WH7972> had sent דָּרְיָ֧וֶשׁ <WH1868> to that which Darius מַלְכָּ֛א <WH4430> the king כְּנֵ֖מָא <WH3660> so אָסְפַּ֥רְנָא <WH629> speedily עֲבַֽדוּ׃ <WH5648> they did

וְשָׂבֵ֤י <WH7868> And the elders יְהוּדָיֵא֙ <WH3062> of the Jews בָּנַ֣יִן <WH1124> builded וּמַצְלְחִ֔ין <WH6744> and they prospered בִּנְבוּאַת֙ <WH5017> through the prophesying חַגַּ֣י <WH2292> of Haggai [נְבִיאָה כ] (נְבִיָּ֔א <WH5029> prophet ק) וּזְכַרְיָ֖ה <WH2148> and Zechariah בַּר־ <WH1247> the son עִדּ֑וֹא <WH5714> of Iddo וּבְנ֣וֹ <WH1124> And they builded וְשַׁכְלִ֗לוּ <WH3635> and finished מִן־ <WH4481> [it] according טַ֙עַם֙ <WH2941> to the commandment אֱלָ֣הּ <WH426> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3479> of Israel וּמִטְּעֵם֙ <WH2942> and according to the commandment כּ֣וֹרֶשׁ <WH3567> of Cyrus וְדָרְיָ֔וֶשׁ <WH1868> and Darius וְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֖שְׂתְּא <WH783> and Artaxerxes מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4430> king פָּרָֽס׃ <WH6540> of Persia

וְשֵׁיצִיא֙ <WH3319> was finished בַּיְתָ֣ה <WH1005> house דְנָ֔ה <WH1836> And this עַ֛ד <WH5705> on י֥וֹם <WH3118> day תְּלָתָ֖ה <WH8532> the third לִירַ֣ח <WH3393> of the month אֲדָ֑ר <WH144> Adar דִּי־ <WH1768> forasmuch הִ֣יא <WH1932> which was שְׁנַת־ <WH8140> year שֵׁ֔ת <WH8353> in the sixth לְמַלְכ֖וּת <WH4437> of the reign דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <WH1868> of Darius מַלְכָּֽא׃ <WH4430> the king פ

וַעֲבַ֣דוּ <WH5648> kept בְנֵֽי־ <WH1123> And the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3479> of Israel כָּהֲנַיָּ֨א <WH3549> the priests וְלֵוָיֵ֜א <WH3879> and the Levites וּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7606> and the rest בְּנֵי־ <WH1123> of the children גָלוּתָ֗א <WH1547> of the captivity חֲנֻכַּ֛ת <WH2597> the dedication בֵּית־ <WH1005> house אֱלָהָ֥א <WH426> of God דְנָ֖ה <WH1836> of this בְּחֶדְוָֽה׃ <WH2305> with joy

וְהַקְרִ֗בוּ <WH7127> And offered לַחֲנֻכַּת֮ <WH2597> at the dedication בֵּית־ <WH1005> house אֱלָהָ֣א <WH426> of God דְנָה֒ <WH1836> of this תּוֹרִ֣ין <WH8450> bullocks מְאָ֔ה <WH3969> an hundred דִּכְרִ֣ין <WH1798> rams מָאתַ֔יִן <WH3969> two hundred אִמְּרִ֖ין <WH563> lambs אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH703> four מְאָ֑ה <WH3969> hundred וּצְפִירֵ֨י <WH6841> he עִזִּ֜ין <WH5796> goats [לְחַטָּיָא כ] (לְחַטָּאָ֤ה <WH2402> sin ק) עַל־ <WH5922> for כָּל־ <WH3606> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3479> Israel תְּרֵֽי־ <WH8648> second עֲשַׂ֔ר <WH6236> ten לְמִנְיָ֖ן <WH4510> according to the number שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7625> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3479> of Israel

וַהֲקִ֨ימוּ <WH6966> And they set כָהֲנַיָּ֜א <WH3549> the priests בִּפְלֻגָּתְה֗וֹן <WH6392> in their divisions וְלֵוָיֵא֙ <WH3879> and the Levites בְּמַחְלְקָ֣תְה֔וֹן <WH4255> in their courses עַל־ <WH5922> for עֲבִידַ֥ת <WH5673> the service אֱלָהָ֖א <WH426> of God דִּ֣י <WH1768> in בִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> which [is] at Jerusalem כִּכְתָ֖ב <WH3792> as it is written סְפַ֥ר <WH5609> in the book מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4873> of Moses פ

וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> kept בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children הַגּוֹלָ֖ה <WH1473> of the captivity אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֑סַח <WH6453> the passover בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> [day] of the first
